# OO EM

```{r setting_up}

library(TnSeq)
data_file <- system.file("mtb_example.tsv", package="TnSeq")
annotation_file <- system.file("mtb_annotation.tsv", package="TnSeq")

```

# Perform essentiality search

```{r em_essentiality}

mtb_tnseq <- TnSeq(data_file, annotation=annotation_file, task="em_nocov")
mtb_em <- PerformEM(mtb_tnseq)
mtb_result <- ScoreEM(mtb_em)

```
